description: Returns the details of the filter specified by the filter name.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the detector that is associated with this filter. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

parameters.name: FilterName
parameters.description: The name of the filter you want to get.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the filter.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the filter.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: Specifies the action that is to be applied to the findings that match the filter.

nested_items.name: Rank
nested_items.description: Specifies the position of the filter in the list of current filters. Also specifies the order in which this filter is applied to the findings.

nested_items.name: FindingCriteria
nested_items.description: Represents the criteria to be used in the filter for querying findings.

nested_items.name: Criterion
nested_items.description: Represents a map of finding properties that match specified conditions and values when querying findings.

nested_items.name: Eq
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Eq
nested_items.description: Represents the equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Neq
nested_items.description: Represents the not equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Gt
nested_items.description: Represents a greater than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_items.name: Gte
nested_items.description: Represents a greater than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_items.name: Lt
nested_items.description: Represents a less than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_items.name: Lte
nested_items.description: Represents a less than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_items.name: Equals
nested_items.description: Represents an equal  condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotEquals
nested_items.description: Represents a not equal  condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: GreaterThan
nested_items.description: Represents a greater than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_items.name: GreaterThanOrEqual
nested_items.description: Represents a greater than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_items.name: LessThan
nested_items.description: Represents a less than condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.

nested_items.name: LessThanOrEqual
nested_items.description: Represents a less than or equal condition to be applied to a single field when querying for findings.
(string) ---
(string) ---
